page.title: 20TREDINGTON FACILITIES
page.content: At Tredington the figures for 1984 1985 UNTIL JUNE Baptisms 0 0 Marriages 1 2 Burials 0 0 There is a{Youth Club}that meets in the Church Hall (village hall). It arose out of the requests from youngsters in the village (Tredington) to meet in the hall, rather than organised by adults. There are no adult Youth Leaders, but parents in turn keep an eye on its progress etc. The Youth Club is only a very small group. The only womens' organisation between the two villages is the {Women's Institute.} There is also a small{prayer group/study group}which meets together every month in a different persons home.
